results.name: a(n) = 6^n mod n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b066604.txt", n, " ", 6^n % n) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Mar 10 2010
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Dec 22 2001
ext: More terms from _Floor van Lamoen_ and _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 27 2001
